Reviews: This is a straight up bar bar with 2 billiard tables, so it's not a chill and kick it type of vibe. It's a low key sports bar nothing more nothing less. I was expecting just that and got what I was expecting. The only thing though is that it's cash only but other then that it's legit to sit down and drink a lil bit before the next bar hop.
First time coming here and i enjoyed it. They have good amount of tables, live music, and just a nice place to have some fun at. It can get a little hot though.
Service was great!! Within five minutes of sitting down 3 servers asked if we we needed anything!! Live Banda and great beer!!
Relevant Content: *Service was great!! *3 servers asked if we we needed anything!!
Replies: * Great service * Multiple servers asked if anything was needed

Reviews: Guys if your planning to take a date out to a bar, this is so not the place. This is more of a guys who just got out from work and want a couple of beers type of bar. Ladies, Ive been here once with my girls and it was a big no no, weird guys hitting you up, all up in your face. One time this guy gave my cousin a paleta de payaso, wtf lol. I decided to give it another try with my boyfriend and still no good for me. One of the servers was rude, we asked her to bring us a bucket of beers that took her almost 20 minutes for her to bring since she was flirting with a group of guys that were behind us drinking of their own beer. So I turn around and tell her \
Relevant Content: *One of the servers was rude *Took almost 20 minutes to bring a bucket of beers *She was flirting with a group of guys instead of attending to us
Replies: * Rude server * Long wait time for beer * Server was more interested in flirting with another group

Reviews: My girlfriend wasn't feeling it....  So we left. This place is an after work drinking with the guys spot. If you want to drink with your girl, take her somewhere nicer.

Summary: Based on the bullet points, there are mixed reviews regarding the service at Las Micheladas. Some reviewers have had a great experience with attentive servers who frequently checked on them. On the other hand, some have mentioned a rude server, long wait time for drinks, and a server who was more interested in flirting with another group than attending to their needs. Overall, it seems that the service at Las Micheladas is inconsistent, with some customers being very pleased and others being dissatisfied.
